name: The Normal Turnabout
summary: It's another day for Apollo Justice. He read the news, he didn't clean the toilet for once, he took a coworker to her friend's house: nothing too out of the ordinary. But something totally shocking and not expected at all occurs - absolutely no one could guess this was about to happen - he gets involved in a MUUUURDER!!! And now he has to defend someone who is clearly innocent and find the real culprit! Can you help him get an acquittal and prove an indictment once again!?
